hero.title: Secure Links
hero.subtitle: Create temporary links that automatically disappear. Perfect for sharing sensitive information, one-time downloads, and time-limited access.

dashboard.title: Advanced URL Management
dashboard.description: Manage all your links in one place. Set expiration dates, add password protection, and track clicks in real-time.

password.title: Password Protection
password.description: Add an extra layer of security to your sensitive links.

expiration.title: Custom Expiration
expiration.description: Set links to expire after a specific time or number of clicks.

fileSharing.title: Secure File Sharing
fileSharing.description: Share files securely with one-time download links.

urlCreation.title: Create Your First Link
urlCreation.description: Transform any URL into a secure, expirable link in seconds. Control access, set expiration times, and protect your content.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Create secure links in under 30 seconds with our intuitive interface.

passwordProtection.title: Password Protection
passwordProtection.description: Add password protection to keep your links secure and private.

customPrivacy.title: Custom Privacy
customPrivacy.description: Choose who can access your links and for how long they remain active.

analytics.description: Get detailed insights into your link performance. Track clicks, analyze traffic sources, and optimize your sharing strategy.

peakPerformance.title: Peak Performance
peakPerformance.description: Your links are performing exceptionally well during business hours.

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.description: Your content is being accessed from multiple countries worldwide.

mobileFirst.title: Mobile-First
mobileFirst.description: Most of your traffic comes from mobile devices. Ensure mobile optimization.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who trust Expireo for their secure link sharing needs.

features.header: Powerful Features for Modern Link Management
features.description: Everything you need to create, manage, and analyze your expirable links with enterprise-grade security and performance.

urlShortening.title: URL Shortening
urlShortening.description: Transform long URLs into clean, professional short links that are easy to share and remember.

expirationSettings.title: Expiration Settings
expirationSettings.description: Set custom expiration times or click limits to automatically deactivate links when needed.

passwordProtection.title: Password Protection
passwordProtection.description: Add password protection to sensitive links for an additional layer of security.

bulkCreation.title: Bulk Creation
bulkCreation.description: Create multiple links at once with CSV import and API integration for efficiency.

secureTransfer.title: Secure File Transfer
secureTransfer.description: Share files up to 1GB securely with end-to-end encryption and automatic cleanup.

oneTimeDownloads.title: One-Time Downloads
oneTimeDownloads.description: Create links that allow only one download before automatically expiring.

largeFileSupport.title: Large File Support
largeFileSupport.description: Upload and share large files without worrying about size limitations or storage costs.

autoExpiration.title: Auto Expiration
autoExpiration.description: Files are automatically deleted from our servers after expiration or download.

clickAnalytics.title: Click Analytics
clickAnalytics.description: Track detailed click data including timestamps, IP addresses, and user agents.

geographicData.title: Geographic Data
geographicData.description: See where your links are being accessed from with detailed geographic insights.

deviceInfo.title: Device Information
deviceInfo.description: Understand your audience with device type, browser, and operating system data.

referrerTracking.title: Referrer Tracking
referrerTracking.description: Track which websites and platforms are driving traffic to your links.

endToEndEncryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
endToEndEncryption.description: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard protocols.

twoFactorAuth.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactorAuth.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account with 2FA support.

customPolicies.title: Custom Security Policies
customPolicies.description: Define custom security policies for different types of links and users.

compliance.title: GDPR & HIPAA Compliance
compliance.description: Built to comply with global data protection regulations and healthcare standards.

teamWorkspaces.title: Team Workspaces
teamWorkspaces.description: Create shared workspaces for your team to collaborate on link management.

roleBasedAccess.title: Role-Based Access Control
roleBasedAccess.description: Assign different permissions and access levels to team members.

sharedLibraries.title: Shared Link Libraries
sharedLibraries.description: Build and share collections of links across your organization.

activityLogs.title: Activity Logs
activityLogs.description: Track all link creation, access, and management activities for audit purposes.

adSupported.title: Ad-Supported Free Tier
adSupported.description: Free plan supported by non-intrusive ads to help us provide the service.

premiumOptions.title: Premium Options
premiumOptions.description: Remove ads and unlock advanced features with our premium plans.

revenueAnalytics.title: Revenue Analytics
revenueAnalytics.description: Track revenue from premium features and enterprise contracts.

paymentIntegration.title: Payment Integration
paymentIntegration.description: Seamlessly integrate with popular payment processors for subscriptions.

stats.description: Join thousands of users who rely on Expireo for their secure link sharing needs.

cta.description: Start creating secure, expirable links today and see the difference.

pricing.description: Choose the plan that works best for you and your team

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Ideal for professionals and small teams

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations with custom requirements

toast.success: You Successfully subscribed and you get all pro version features
toast.error: Failed to update subscription. Please try again.

changePlans.question: Can I change plans anytime?
changePlans.answer: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time. Changes to your plan will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

nonProfits.question: Do you offer discounts for non-profits?
nonProfits.answer: Absolutely! We offer special pricing for non-profit organizations and educational institutions. Contact our sales team for more information.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and for annual plans we also support bank transfers.

setupFee.question: Is there a setup fee?
setupFee.answer: No, there are no setup fees for any of our plans. You only pay the advertised price.

refund.question: Can I get a refund?
refund.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all annual plans. Monthly plans can be canceled at any time without further charges.

customPlans.question: Do you offer custom plans?
customPlans.answer: Yes, we can create custom plans for organizations with specific needs. Contact our sales team to discuss your requirements.

cta.description: Our team is here to help you choose the right plan for your needs.

contact.description: Have questions or need support? We're here to help you make the most of Expireo.

office.title: Office
office.address: 123 Tech Street, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA

responseTime.question: What's your typical response time?
responseTime.answer: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent technical issues, we provide priority support.

supportChannels.question: What support channels do you offer?
supportChannels.answer: We offer support through email, live chat, and our comprehensive help center. Enterprise customers also get dedicated account managers.

technicalIssues.question: How do I report technical issues?
technicalIssues.answer: For technical issues, please use our contact form or email support@expireo.com with detailed information about the problem you're experiencing.

businessInquiries.question: How can I inquire about business partnerships?
businessInquiries.answer: For business partnerships, custom solutions, or enterprise inquiries, please contact our sales team at sales@expireo.com.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your account information and preferences
